author: antoine.cathalau
title: Qinesis: QiGong & mindfulness Dapp
description: Il n'existe encore aucune application de pleine conscience, ce qui laisse un grand vide pour l'acquisition d'utilisateurs.

f6_assessments.q0:
Yes sure, when there are thousands of NFT games, but lack of healthy dApp in blockchain industry. Hence I think this app can help the problem they recognize. Following the user experience that the team describes in the proposal, we can understand how user will be motivate to interact with the app and I think it will impact to the development of Cardano user communities. 
In addition, they have a very clear vision of success and key metrics that align with the challenge setting.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team has a detailed plan for implementing their yoga app to the world, and the budget that they required is reasonable with that plan. Moreover, they also mention that they had a ready resource of 250 yoga exercises so I think their plan will work. 
The only thing I need to be cleared here is some relevant risk to their plan, but I think the experience of one of them in the team in publishing app will help the team get rid of problems.
f6_assessments.q2:
The team has shown a roadmap that details not just in developing the app but also further with the plan to develop to increase users, and their key metrics are realistic with their plan to develop the app goes further - as my experience. 
About the problem and solution, they explain very detail and understandable, even more, explanation about the features of the app and how It can attract users will help people well understand about it structure more and be used for assessing the feasibility of the app better.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal has a certain degree of impact on the integration from a traditional business; in this case, it is a type of meditation or yoga business and move into web 3.0; this case is Cardano ecosystem. This would be an excellent example of migrating or integrating the traditional business black platform into the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has provided sufficient information on how to deliver the project within three months and requested $9800 (the max threshold allowed is $10,000), which matched one of the three criteria of this challenge. The team experienced all well and listed; however, in terms of the app and smart contract development and integration, the budget allocation of only $2700 is a little bit small and not sufficient to cover up the core component for the entire project.  The proposal has not indicated which programming language and how they integrate a smart contract and the app's development in the milestone in the next three months.
f6_assessments.q2: The team have highlighted each task and where they got to complete it in phases of development in the next three months. Extracted from the project, "After 3 months, success will be to have a fully functional Dapp, the first of its kind, with at least 100 exercises integrated". I believe the team has many videos already. Therefore, the main integration task would lay on smart contract development.  So, with the promise to the website and the apps on the smartphone device, that would make it feasible for the challenge team to follow up and report on this proposal development progress.

f6_assessments.q0:
There is not enough explanation of why this app needs to be on a blockchain, and what problems are solved by making this a decentralized application. 

No evidence was provided that shows the demand for such an app in the Cardano ecosystem, or references to similar dapps built on other blockchains that attracted new users to those platforms.

It is hard for me to see how this dapp will lead to user growth or increased interoperability with other projects on Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1:
They have already started building their website and iOS app, that shows they are committed to creating their product, and the media contents.  

It seems that this will be the first time they are trying to develop a dapp, so I don't know if the budget and timeframe is enough if they want to create their own token, staking mechanism and NFT marketplace.
f6_assessments.q2:
Again, it would be easier to assess the auditability if there was a more clear explanation of how they will integrate their product with the blockchain, and what specific problem this solves for the wider community. 

They have provided some numbers on the amount of content they will create, and the number of users they hope to attract to the dapp. 

However, there is not enough indicators for assessing the dapp integration on the blockchain itself, and what success looks like in that regard. Also, there is not enough information provided to assess the impact their finalised product will bring to the Cardano ecosystem in the future.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved has been identified and articulated namely There is no mindfulness dapp yet
 
 
  
This proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief through creating the next generation of meditation app : a combination of still and moving meditation with blockchain  monetization strategies.

This proposal   shows somewhat how it will add value to the Cardano System through enabling a type of Dapp namely a mindfulness app and possibly creating a better mental and emotional state among users. Also by bringing educational and wellness apps to the Cardano Ecosystem.The question to ask is how this relates to Cardano itself? Does it promote the spread of Cardano?  True it may benefit one aspect of the community member's life? but this then can be applied to gain funding for just about anything since any good or service can be said to bring benefit to a community members life.
 
 Goals of the proposal have been stated clearly namely to build the first wellness app

Key metrics and goals of the proposal been stated clearly namely no of exercises, no of users in community no of Discord members, no of Twitter users, no of offline events and no of participants at each.
 
The proposal can be scaled to address future challenges because they refer to the initial number of videos and content and this can be gradually increased.

It cannot be firmly said whether this would have a positive impact on Cardano system. While it may benefit a small perscentage of users I cannot say it would benefit the community as a whole.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has provided evidence of relevant skills and experience needed to complete the project. 
 
 
These links are sufficient  
 
I have not visited these links and contacted the relevant people
 
I have not been able to assess their level of competence

 
Proposer has stated only the two core members. 
 
he has rationally and logically laid out his team structure and breakdown 
 Budget has been outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items
 
 The budget is reasonable to achieve the set goals 
 
Proposer has not provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required to implement the proposal

  
Proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work
 
 
The proposal providea a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how?
 

 The plan doesnt describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal
 
the proposal does not clearly explain  technical aspects like architecture, language and technologies if they are crucial for implementation
 
No  proposer has not considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation
f6_assessments.q2:
There is  clearly laid out a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement
 
Yes there are clearly defined Metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal such as no of exercises, no of users in community no of Discord members, no of Twitter users, no of offline events and no of participants at each.
 
The proposer has not identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties 
 
 There are no contingency plans in place for various outcomes

f6_assessments.q0: I think this app. is a great idea, however, I'm doubtful of the value it will bring to the Cardano ecosystem. I wonder how many people will likely use the app. The proposal needs more details of how the app. will be funded in the future and the use cases and value of the CARE token. It isn't clear why it needs the blockchain. A centralised app. will have less transaction fees, but could still offer a points system similar to the CARE token. SingularityNET has a similar project called Mindplex. Have you thought of merging your project with theirs?
f6_assessments.q1: Includes Twitter handles. They have already released an IOS app. which proves that they can complete projects successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: Clear and simple KPIs, which are measurable and achievable.

solution: La prochaine génération d'application de méditation : une combinaison de méditation immobile et en mouvement avec des stratégies de monétisation par blockchain.
experience: Plus de 20 ans d'expérience dans le secteur du bien-être, dont 10 ans à la tête d'un studio numérique et de produits basés sur des applications.
